data.name: Olive Performance Nylon & Spandex Fabric
data.description:
Perfect for the active individual, this high-performance Nylon & Spandex fabric seamlessly transitions from intense workouts to casual errands and relaxed lounging. Boasting fashion-forward aesthetics and unparalleled functionality, our fabric offers superior stretch, optimal retention, and unmatched comfort. Key performance features include moisture-wicking abilities, body-shaping compression, and temperature-regulating properties. Despite its lightweight nature, this fabric showcases impressive resilience, making it ideal for performance wear in any setting. Proven to be colorfast even in chlorinated pool water and sea water, this fabric is also swimwear-safe.

  • Width: 59 inches
  • Content: 82% Nylon, 18% Spandex
  • Care: Machine wash gentle cold, non-chlorine bleach, line dry
  • Imported

Discover the Beauty of Blue Cluster Floral on White Pointelle Fabric

Elevate your wardrobe with the stunning Blue Cluster Floral on White Pointelle Fabric. This fabric is perfect for creating unique and stylish apparel pieces that are sure to turn heads. The intricate floral design in shades of blue on a white background adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to any outfit. Whether you're creating blouses, tops, bottoms, dresses, or skirts, this fabric is sure to make a statement.

Not only is this fabric beautiful, but it's also practical. With a width of 57 inches and a content of 51% Rayon, 29% Polyester, and 20% Nylon, this fabric is both durable and comfortable. It's easy to care for too - simply machine wash gentle cold, cool iron, nonchlorine bleach, and line dry.

Product Details

data.name: Solid Interlock Knit Fabric
data.description:
Discover the unparalleled comfort and versatility of the Interlock Knit Fabric Solids.

Crafted with a unique double-knit construction, this fabric provides a smooth surface on both sides, making it ideal for designs that require a clean finish inside and out. Its inherent stretch and elasticity mean it adapts gracefully to body movements, offering unparalleled comfort whether you're crafting athletic wear, cozy loungewear, or everyday staples. The cotton-polyester blend not only enhances its soft drape but also ensures it maintains shape and color wash after wash.

Product Details:
  • Width: 57 Inches
  • Content: 60% Cotton 40% Polyester
  • Care: Machine wash gentle separately cold, mild detergent, non-chlorine bleach, reshape, lay flat, cool iron
  • Imported

data.name: Halloween Foil Orange Bats Interlock Knit Fabric by POP!
data.description:
Give the kids a ghoulishly good time this season with our Halloween fabric. Combined with spandex, this cotton material gives nice stretch for movement and flexibility, along with extra thickness for cooler nights of trick-or-treating. Choose between spiderwebs or monster mashing pals for designing apparel like pajamas and leggings. Whatever you make, the whole family is in for a treat.

  • Width: 57 Inches
  • Content: 98% Cotton(Staple), 2% Spandex(Filament)
  • Care: Machine Wash Gentle Cold, Non-Chlorine Bleach, Line Dry, Cool Iron
  • Imported
